Title: Requires insurers to issue healthcare policies in the state to include all costs of any COVID-19 test without a copayment or deductible
Summary: Requires insurers to issue healthcare policies in the state to include all costs of any COVID-19 test without a copayment, coinsurance or deductible.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring insurers to issue healthcare policies in the state to include all costs of any COVID-19 test without copayments or deductibles; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
